greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of numbers related to rooted trees and unrooted planar trees.
comment: The main diagonal is A000169: n^(n-1).
The alternating sum in row n is (-1)^(n-1)*(n - 1)!
reference: R. L. Graham, D. E. Knuth and O. Patashnik, Concrete Mathematics, Addison-Wesley, Reading, MA, 2nd ed. 1998.
formula: Formula for row n: Sum_{k = 0..n-1} T(n,k)*y^k = Product_{k = 1..n-1} (k + n*y)

E.g.f.: A(x,t) = Sum_{n >= 1} 1/(n*t)*binomial(n*t + n - 1, n)*x^n = log(B_(t+1)(x)), where B_t(x) = Sum_{n >= 0} 1/(n*t + 1)*binomial(n*t + 1, n)*x^n is Lambert's generalized binomial series - see Graham et al., Section 5.4. - _Peter Bala_, Nov 08 2015
maple: seq(seq(coeff(product(n*x + k, k = 1..n-1), x, i), i = 0..n-1), n = 1..8); # _Peter Bala_, Nov 08 2015
mathematica: T[n_, m_] := (n^(m-1)*Binomial[n-1, m-1]*Sum[((-1)^(n-m-k)*Binomial[n+k-1, k]*StirlingS2[n-m+k, k]*Binomial[2*n-m, n-m-k])/Binomial[n-m+k, k], {k, 0, n-m}]); Table[T[n, m], {n, 1, 8}, {m, 1, n}] // Flatten (* Jean-François Alcover, Feb 23 2017, after Vladimir Kruchinin *)
T[ n_, k_] := If[ n < 1 || k < 1, 0, Coefficient[ (-1)^(n - k) Binomial[n z, n] (n - 1)!, z, k]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Aug 01 2019 *)
program: (PARI) {T(n, k) = if( n < 1 || k < 1, 0, polcoeff( (-1)^(n-k) * binomial(n*x, n)*(n-1)!, k))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Aug 01 2019 */
results.author: _F. Chapoton_, Aug 31 2000
